public void setSpecial(boolean special)

setSiteId

public void setSiteId(java.lang.String episodeSiteId)
The id of the as it's found on the sources size. Quite often these don't start from 1 for each season, but carry on counting.

Parameters:
episodeSiteId - The id of the episode as found on the site
